ygData.subject: RE: NPC's Binding
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh I forgot to mention, this is with my level 21 warrior.  I don t have the benefit of accelerando.  I will usually auction for a SoW for 2 gp and then reward
ygData.messageBody:
Oh I forgot to mention, this is with my level 21 warrior. I don't have the
benefit of accelerando. I will usually auction for a SoW for 2 gp and then
reward much more depending on how long I have to auction :)

> ----------
> From: chlebek@...[SMTP:chlebek@...]
> Reply To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 2:21 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] NPC's Binding
>
> From: chlebek@...
>
>
>
>
> > From: "Jones, Brian" <brian.jones@...>
> >
> > As you get higher level, you will forget less and less about binding.
> The
> > other night I went back to Freeport from Mistmoore and you know what? I
> had
> > no idea where I was bound - thats how long it had been. I did auction
> that
> > I was looking for a bound and a kindly female woodelf did me the favor
> > (took less than 2 minutes off the boat).
>
>
> Exactly! I've gotten to the point where I have 2 bind points that I bounce
> back
> and forth between: Faydwer (anywhere) and Antonica (anywhere). Did I
> mention I
> really hate the Freeport/Butcherblock boat route? :-)
>
> Taelin
>
